flawed_nl_solution:
Of the males with stripes, 40% are babies because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
There are 10 males with stripes because 4 / 0.4 = <<4/0.4=10>>10
There are 40 males because 10 / (1/4) = <<10/(1/4)=40>>40
Males make up 50% of the pond's total, because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=50>>50
There are 80 turtles in total 40 / 0.5 = <<40/0.5=80>>80
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
